name: The Impossible Mission
description:
Description:

You've crash landed on an alien planet and now it's your job to find all the necessary parts to fix the shuttle!

Controls:

You'll find a tutorial page inside the game.

To quit the game while playing -  Alt + F4.

Team:

Bruno Leme (Game Desiner/Animator and Programmer)

Philip Purol (3D Modeler/Level Designer)

Raj Dimatera (3D Modeler/Level Designer/Sounds)

Rayan Askew (Concept Art/UI Designer/Level Designer)

Install Instructions:

Extract and Run!

This was our first game!

It was a big challenge, but a really good one! 

Thanks to all the TOJam for the support! 

Great Event!
